casebody.data:
United Community Bank
v.
Wolfe, et al. 289PA15-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 9, 2016 *801Donald H. Barton, Attorney at Law, Brevard, for Wolfe, Thomas L., et al. Esther E. Manheimer, Attorney at Law, Robert Ashley Mays, Attorney at Law, Mark A. Pinkston, Attorney at Law, Asheville, for United Community Bank (Georgia). Clint S. Morse, Attorney at Law, Robert A. Singer, Attorney at Law, Greensboro, for North Carolina Bankers Association

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 7th of September 20 16 by NC Bankers Association for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of September 2016."

Unless already submitted, the Amicus Brief shall be submitted to the court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 28(i).
